name: FANDOM Wiki
author: Ribose
description: Command to request detailed content of FANDOM Wiki pages.
short: Command to request FANDOM Wiki pages.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the FANDOM Wiki (previously known as Wikia) command. Remember to set a default subdomain with `[p]fandomset default`. The command is `[p]fandom article`, or `[p]fandom -w subdomain article`
